name: BurningManCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open burning man countdown”
”Alexa, start burning man countdown”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: burning man countdown
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until The Man burns. This is a great way to stay connected to your home on the playa.
